name: Md Shihab Jamil
shortnote: 8+ years of experience in the field of Software Industry in Bangladesh.
leadtext: Native in Bengali, Fluent in English and 'Okay' in Programming
about: Although I had started my career with Business Intelligence and Datawarehousing developement and had continued those works for 7 years 3 month. But I never stopped learning the up-to-date technologies to cope-up myself with the fast growing tech world. Willing to jump into any problem and develop 'outside the box' solutions.
Later I have changed my career track from BI to Frontend-Backend Development. On September, 2018 I have joined Escenic Asia Ltd. as a Full Stack Developer.
I am very passionate about creating stuffs with React, Angular, etc. At the same time I still had the soft corner for Machine Learning and Big Data.

education.uni: Khulna University of Engineering and Technology

testimonials.quote: Shihab is very Bright and Scholar in his academic as well as professional career.
testimonials.role: IT Professional, Currently pursuing Masters in Germany

testimonials.quote: Shihab is an outstanding resource. I have worked with him closely. He does everything very professionally. More importantly, he can pick up things very quickly. He has worked on varieties of technologies (Database, SQL, OLAP Cubes, .NET) and made his mark everywhere. Always demonstrates highest level of dedication and professionalism. He is always keen to learn new things. A great team player as well. I wish him all the best.

I have managed and worked with Shihab for around 2 years at IQVIA. One of the best database developers I had in my team. I have found him to be highly professional, technically very sound and proactively engaging himself to work with latest technologies. I wish all the best to him and look forward to continue working with him in future as well.

Shihab Jamil is a Great Developer, he is very proficient in technologies like Data Warehousing, SQL Server, Analysis services and so on. Except that he is very eager to learn to new technologies. If you are thinking about something with data he is the guy you can rely on.

Shihab Jamil is a Great Developer, he is very proficient in technologies like Data Warehousing, SQL Server, Analysis services and so on. Except that he is very eager to learn to new technologies. If you are thinking about something with data he is the guy you can rely on.

It was overwhelming to work together with Shihab, who was an exceptional developer in one of my projects. I must say he is dedicated, self-motivated and very capable. It was an inception of his career when we work in a project, and his way of thinking, analysis a problem, planning and quality of work really amazed me. At the end, his hard work paid off by making the project successful. He has all the required attributes that is quite a rear combination to find in a developer all together. And I would say this professional characteristic makes him a valuable asset to any organization. It would be a great pleasure for me if I ever get a chance to work with him again in future. I would highly recommend him for his outstanding technical skills and professionalism.
